## Welcome to Data Workflow Documentation

The [U.S. Greenhouse Gas (GHG) Center](https://earth.gov/ghgcenter) provides a cloud-based system for exploring and analyzing U.S. government and other curated greenhouse gas datasets.

You can find the data workflow for each dataset explaining how each dataset has been handeled.
Dataset **data workflow** examples:

1. [CASA-GFED3 Land Carbon Flux](data_workflow/casagfed-carbonflux-monthgrid-v3_Data_Flow.qmd)
